description:
### 11.55 dblur

Apply Directional blur filter.

The filter accepts the following options:

**angle**

    Set angle of directional blur. Default is 45. 

**radius**

    Set radius of directional blur. Default is 5. 

**planes**

    Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.
name: dblur

options.description: Set angle of directional blur. Default is 45.
options.name: angle

options.description: Set radius of directional blur. Default is 5.
options.name: radius

options.description: Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.
options.name: planes
